entry.title: Getting wired and wireless working on ubuntu 9.0.4
entry.content:
It might be the case that earlier wireless was working and then it stopped working

Follow the simple steps here….

1. Restart networking sudo /etc/init.d/networking restart 2. Disable the “Support for Atheros 802.11 wireless LAN cards” on system/administration/Hardware Drivers, and reboot your box 3. Restart sudo reboot That’s it, Cheers! Still having problem follow the instructions here
